title: Weird lines through game
body: I have these weird lines showing up through my game, I also play counter strike source and have no issues. Lately when I load in game it will drop both monitors into power save mode. Running radeon x1600 256mb card.

replies.body:
You may have issues going on with your graphics drivers or your windows power settings. If your drivers misbehave or windows doesn't have the right power settings, League could have a hard time interacting with your graphics card. To resolve this, I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).

Let me know if you notice any change in your issue after working through those steps.
